sentences.sentence: Male flowers are in proximal leaf axil of young branchlets.
sentences.translation: 雄花在幼嫩小枝的下部的叶腋里。

sentences.sentence: Male flowers: clustered in proximal leaf axil of young branchlets.

sentences.sentence: Implicit the first cystic inflorescence, was born the axil, no pedicel.
